## Plane.FromPoints() method

Creates a plane from three points

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static FromPoints(point1: Vector3, point2: Vector3, point3: Vector3): Plane;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  point1 | <code>Vector3</code> | point used to create the plane |
|  point2 | <code>Vector3</code> | point used to create the plane |
|  point3 | <code>Vector3</code> | point used to create the plane |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Plane`

a new Plane defined by the three given points.
